description: A none-mutated human (NMH) almost looks like humans today, but they're somewhat more resilient and though. They don't like mutants, even if they were the ones that created them. The most NMH's consider they've got the rights to rule over mutants, mutated animals and robots.

Mutated Humans have physical mutations that are both good and bad, the bad ones are called defects. Mutants often sees themself as less worthy than NMH, and some see their mutations making them stronger. Mutants are often very tolerant to other classes.

A Psi-mutant is a mentally mutated human. They have released powers in their brain, such as telepathic and teleknesis. But while their brains have developed, their bodies have weakend. Psi-mutants only has mental mutations, they're always humans, never animals. Psi-mutants recents physical violence, they appreciate intelligence in all forms. Psi-mutants are often secret about their powers, because NMH's thinks they are weird and filled with evil forces.
